name: SSH Protocol Version 1 Supported
description:
SSH1 protocol was deprecated due to multiple vulnerabilities and design flaws.
Among multiple vulnerabilities that exist in SSH protocol Version 1 are:
<UL>
<LI>a CRC32 compensation attack detector vulnerability (buffer overflow)
<LI>an unauthorized sessi
detail:
SSH1 supported	yes
Supported authentications for SSH1	RSA,password
Supported ciphers for SSH1	3des,blowfish
